groupbuilder.utility.csv_read module

CSV Utility Module

This module provides utilities for working with CSV files, including detecting file encoding and CSV delimiters.

detect_file_encoding(file_path)

Detect the encoding of a file.

detect_csv_separator_and_load(file_path)

Detect the CSV separator and load the file content.
groupbuilder.utility.csv_read.detect_csv_separator_and_load(file_path)[source]

Detect the CSV separator and load the file content.

This function performs three operations: 1. Detects the file encoding 2. Uses csv.Sniffer to determine the delimiter character 3. Loads the entire CSV content into memory

Empty rows are filtered out from the final result.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – The path to the CSV file to be loaded.

Returns:

A tuple containing: - list: The content of the CSV file as a list of rows. - str: The detected delimiter used in the CSV file. - str: The detected encoding of the CSV file.

Return type:

tuple[list, str, str]

groupbuilder.utility.csv_read.detect_file_encoding(file_path)[source]

Detect the encoding of a file.

Uses chardet library to analyze the beginning of the file and determine the most likely character encoding.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – The path to the file whose encoding is to be detected.

Returns:

The detected encoding of the file.

Return type:

str
